ProteinName	Sprouty-related, EVH1 domain-containing protein 2 (Spred-2)
GeneName	SPRED2
Length	415
Function	Negatively regulates Ras signaling pathways and downstream activation of MAP kinases (PubMed:15683364, PubMed:34626534). Recruits and translocates NF1 to the cell membrane, thereby enabling NF1-dependent hydrolysis of active GTP-bound Ras to inactive GDP-bound Ras (PubMed:34626534). Inhibits fibroblast growth factor (FGF)-induced retinal lens fiber differentiation, probably by inhibiting FGF-mediated phosphorylation of ERK1/2 (By similarity). Inhibits TGFB-induced epithelial-to-mesenchymal transition in lens epithelial cells (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle membrane; Cytoplasm
